attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore is a dieing breed of bull dog british citizen and a beacon of what it means to be british and deserved this great honour for what he has been through and what he has currently done
attributes.background: Consider giving Captain Tom Moore a Knighthood for the commitment he has done to raise over £6 million pounds for our great NHS service.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
